product_name: Smith Transit Snow Goggles - Mist Frame - Women's
long_description: The women's Smith Transit Mist snow goggles feature a bronze tinted lens, good fog control and a comfortable fit, all for an excellent value. Ignitor Mirror lens features a bronze tint and 35% visible light transmission to reduce eye fatigue while enhancing contrast and depth perception in all conditions. Vents at the top of the cylindrical lens help combat fogging. Cushy single-layer face foam offers a good seal against your face. Adjustable strap is backed with a silicone bead so it stays in place on your helmet. The Smith Scope snow goggles fit small-size faces and come with a microfiber storage bag.
short_description: The women's Smith Transit Mist snow goggles feature a bronze tinted lens, good fog control and a comfortable fit, all for an excellent value.
